_header: Mistress Dorothy God both save and see
_description: Prayer for the recipient of the book, one Dorothy — one couplet

HunHM136.Transcription:
Mystrys Dorethe god bovth save and seAnd gravnte enow that she may
                    know the verete
HunHM136.Note: Added to upper margin by a hand of sixteenth century.
HunHM136.Editions:
Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.  
             “The Index of Middle English Verse and Huntington Library Collections: A
                Checklist of Addenda.” 
             Publications of the Bibliographical Society of America
         74 (1980): 235-58: 249.
